categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 21

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 21 is the twenty-first issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with right leg parts and fixing screws head frame, sensor, and leg parts for the buildable R2-D2 and contained the articles "The Return of C-3PO", "8D8-series smelter droids" and "Nanorobotics".
